titleStmt.title: Two declarations of the Parliament of the commonwealth of England concerning Scotland. Together with several proceedings of the commissioners appointed by the Parliament for ordering and managing affairs in Scotland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: The declarations state the Parliament's intentions to incorporate Scotland into the commonwealth of England and exact damages from Scots who opposed Parliament in the civil war.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
